entries: The yuan-ti can use its action to polymorph into a Medium snake or back into its true form. Its statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It doesn't change form if it dies.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The yuan-ti has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Poison's Disciple (2/Day)
entries: The first time the yuan-ti hits with a melee attack on its turn, it can deal an extra 16 (3d10) poison damage to the target.

action.name: Multiattack (Yuan-ti Form Only)
entries: The yuan-ti makes two bite attacks using its snake arms.

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) poison damage.

action.name: Merrshaulk's Slumber (1/Day)
entries: The yuan-ti targets up to five creatures that it can see within 60 feet of it. Each target must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or fall into a magical sleep and be unconscious for 10 minutes. A sleeping target awakens if it takes damage or if someone uses an action to shake or slap it awake. This magical sleep has no effect on a creature immune to being charmed.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The yuan-ti's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 12). The yuan-ti can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The yuan-ti has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The yuan-ti makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Scimitar
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) slashing damage.

action.name: Shortbow
entries: Ranged Weapon Attack. +3 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) poison damage.

name: Zaratan
resist: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage from nonmagical attacks

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the zaratan fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Siege Monster
entries: The elemental deals double damage to objects and structures (included in Earth-Shaking Movement).

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The zaratan makes one Bite attack and one Stomp attack.

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +17 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. Hit: 28 (4d8 + 10) force damage.

action.name: Stomp
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +17 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. Hit: 26 (3d10 + 10) thunder damage.

action.name: Spit Rock
entries: Ranged Weapon Attack. +17 to hit, range 120 ft./240 ft., one target. Hit: 31 (6d8 + 10) force damage.

action.name: Spew Debris (Recharge 5-6)
entries: The zaratan exhales rocky debris in a 90-foot cube. Each creature in that area must make a DC 25 Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes 33 (6d10) bludgeoning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. A creature that fails the save by 5 or more is knocked prone.

bonus.name: Earth-Shaking Movement
entries: After moving at least 10 feet on the ground, the zaratan sends a shock wave through the ground in a 120-foot-radius circle centered on itself. That area becomes difficult terrain for 1 minute. Each creature on the ground that is concentrating must succeed on a DC 25 Constitution saving throw or the creature's concentration is broken. The shock wave deals 100 thunder damage to all structures in contact with the ground in the area. If a creature is near a structure that collapses, the creature might be buried; a creature within half the distance of the structure's height must make a DC 25 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 17 (5d6) bludgeoning damage, is knocked prone, and is trapped in the rubble. A trapped creature is restrained, requiring a successful DC 20 Strength (Athletics) check as an action to escape. Another creature within 5 feet of the buried creature can use its action to clear rubble and grant advantage on the check. If three creatures use their actions in this way, the check is an automatic success. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage and doesn't fall prone or become trapped.

legendary.name: Stomp
entries: The zaratan makes one Stomp attack.

legendary.name: Move
entries: The zaratan moves up to its speed.

legendary.name: Spit (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The zaratan makes one Spit Rock attack.

legendary.name: Retract (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The zaratan retracts into its shell. Until it takes its Emerge action, it has resistance to all damage, and it is restrained. The next time it takes a legendary action, it must take its Revitalize or Emerge action.

legendary.name: Revitalize (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The zaratan can use this option only if it is retracted in its shell. It regains 52 () hit points. The next time it takes a legendary action, it must take its Emerge action.

legendary.name: Emerge (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The zaratan emerges from its shell and makes one Spit Rock attack. It can use this option only if it is retracted in its shell.

action.name: Hooves
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (2d4 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

name: Zombie Clot
languages: understands the languages it knew in life but can't speak

trait.name: Deathly Stench
entries: Any creature that starts its turn within 10 feet of the zombie must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or take 9 (2d8) poison damage and be poisoned until the start of the creature's next turn.

trait.name: Undead Fortitude
entries: If damage reduces the zombie to 0 hit points, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5 + the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a success, the zombie drops to 1 hit point instead.

trait.name: Unusual Nature
entries: The zombie doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The zombie makes two Slam attacks.

action.name: Slam
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 18 (3d8 + 5) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Flesh Entomb (Recharge 5-6)
entries: The zombie flings a detached clump of corpses at a creature it can see within 30 feet of it. The target must succeed on a DC 16 Strength saving throw or take 16 (3d10) bludgeoning damage, and if the target is a Large or smaller creature, it becomes entombed in dead flesh.

A creature entombed in the dead flesh is restrained, has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the dead flesh, and takes 10 (3d6) necrotic damage at the start of each of its turns. The creature can be freed if the dead flesh is destroyed. The dead flesh is a Large object with AC 10, 25 hit points, and immunity to poison and psychic damage.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The zorbo has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Natural Armor
entries: The zorbo magically absorbs the natural strength of its surroundings, adjusting its Armor Class based on the material it is standing or climbing on: AC 15 for wood or bone, AC 17 for earth or stone, or AC 19 for metal. If the zorbo isn't in contact with any of these substances, its AC is 10.

action.name: Destructive Claws
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (2d6 + 1) slashing damage, and if the target is a creature wearing armor, carrying a shield, or in possession of a magic item that improves its AC, it must make a DC 11 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, one such item worn or carried by the creature (the target's choice) magically deteriorates, taking a permanent and cumulative âˆ’1 penalty to the AC it offers, and the zorbo gains a +1 bonus to AC until the start of its next turn. Armor reduced to an AC of 10 or a shield or magic item that drops to a 0 AC increase is destroyed.

name: Zuggtmoy
immune: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage from nonmagical attacks

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: Zuggtmoy's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 22). She can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If Zuggtmoy fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Zuggtmoy has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: Zuggtmoy's weapon attacks are magical.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Zuggtmoy makes three pseudopod attacks.

action.name: Pseudopod
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +13 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 15 (2d8 + 6) bludgeoning damage plus 9 (2d8) poison damage.

action.name: Infestation Spores (3/Day)
entries: Zuggtmoy releases spores that burst out in a cloud that fills a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on her, and it lingers for 1 minute. Any flesh-and-blood creature in the cloud when it appears, or that enters it later, must make a DC 19 Constitution saving throw. On a successful save, the creature can't be infected by these spores for 24 hours. On a failed save, the creature is infected with a disease called the spores of Zuggtmoy and also gains a random form of madness (determined by rolling on the Madness of Zuggtmoy table) that lasts until the creature is cured of the disease or dies. While infected in this way, the creature can't be reinfected, and it must repeat the saving throw at the end of every 24 hours, ending the infection on a success. On a failure, the infected creature's body is slowly taken over by fungal growth, and after three such failed saves, the creature dies and is reanimated as a spore servant if it's a type of creature that can be (see the "Myconids" entry in the Monster Manual).

action.name: Mind Control Spores (Recharge 5-6)
entries: Zuggtmoy releases spores that burst out in a clouds that fills a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on her, and it lingers for 1 minute. Humanoids and beasts in the cloud when it appears, or that enter it later, must make a DC 19 Wisdom saving throw. On a successful save, the creature can't be infected by these spores for 24 hours. On a failed save, the creature is infected with a disease called the influence of Zuggtmoy for 24 hours. While infected in this way, the creature is charmed by her and can't be reinfected by these spores.

reaction.name: Protective Thrall
entries: When Zuggtmoy is hit by an attack, one creature within 5 feet of Zuggtmoy that is charmed by her must use its reaction to be hit by the attack instead.

legendary.name: Attack
entries: Zuggtmoy makes one pseudopod attack.

legendary.name: Exert Will
entries: One creature charmed by Zuggtmoy that she can see must use its reaction to move up to its speed as she directs or to make a weapon attack against a target that she designates.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting (Psionics)
headerEntries: The biote casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 12):

action.name: Echoing Scratch
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +0 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 slashing damage. At the end of each of its turns, the target must make a DC 12 Wisdom saving throw, taking 1 slashing damage on a failure or ending the recurring slashing damage on a success.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting (Psionics)
headerEntries: The gonbun casts one of the following spells, requiring no spell components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 13):

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d8 - 1) piercing damage.

action.name: Spit Fire (Recharge 4-6)
entries: The GonBun spits a wave of flames that cover a 15 foot cone. Each creature in the area must succeed on a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw or take 1d8 fire damage.

trait.name: Shapechanger
entries: The m'aw can use its action to polymorph into a Tiny or Small creature, or back into its true form. Each form resembles a beast, but has strange features like vibrant colors, extra eyes or legs, or other unnatural traits. Its statistics, other than its size, are the same in each form. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

action.name: Swallow
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one Small or Tiny creature. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) necrotic damage and the target is swallowed. The swallowed creature can't breathe, is restrained, and takes 3 (1d6) necrotic damage at the start of each of the m'aw's turns. During this time, the target creature exists in a pocket dimension.
An engulfed creature can try to escape by taking an action to make a DC 12 Strength check. On a success, the creature escapes and enters an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the m'aw.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting (Psionics)
headerEntries: The nyart's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 13). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components:

trait.name: Untraceable
entries: The nyart cannot be targeted by any divination magic, perceived through magical scrying sensors, and all attempts to teleport to the nyart automatically fail.

trait.name: Wormhole
entries: As a bonus action, the nyart can create a small, inky black wormhole within 5 feet of itself. The wormhole can lead to anywhere in the universe the nyart desires, provided there is at least 1 square foot of darkness near the destination. Only the nyart can use the rift, and it lasts until the end of the nyart's next turn.

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 piercing damage.

action.name: Whispers of Doom
entries: The nyrat targets one creature within 30 feet of it. The target must succeed on a DC 13 Wisdom saving throw or take 4 (2d4) psychic damage.

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d4 + 1) piercing damage plus 4 (1d8) necrotic damage.

action.name: Ram
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (2d4 + 1) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Create Young
entries: The shub breaths out a primordial fog that spawns 1d4 young. A young is a tiny aberration with an AC of 12, 1 hit point, and a flying speed of 15 feet. They have a +2 to attack and deal 1 necrotic damage. On the shub's turn, it can use a bonus action to command any young within 30 feet of it to attack one enemy of its choice. A shub can have up to 10 young.

trait.name: Enigmatic Nature
entries: The skinti is immune to scrying and to any effect that would sense its emotions, read its thoughts, or detect its location.

action.name: Noodle
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Meatball
entries: Ranged Weapon Attack. +2 to hit, range 15/30 ft., one target. Hit: 2 (1d4) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Latch On
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one Medium or smaller creature. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage and the target is grappled (escape DC 12). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, blinded, and at risk of suffocating. While grappling a creature this way, the skull tick is also restrained. In addition, at the start of each of the target's turns, the target takes 2 (1d4) piercing damage.

action.name: Claim Host
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature the skull tick is latched on to. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage. If the target is reduced to 0 hit points, the skull tick kills the target by taking control of their brain. As long as the skull tick is attached to this body, it can control the body and gains the same statistics as a zombie. It can choose to detach itself as an action. The skull tick dies if the zombie is slain while it is attached.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting (Psionics)
headerEntries: The soth's innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 14). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components:

action.name: Tentacle
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +4 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 2 (1d8 - 2) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Chaotic Tune
entries: The thoth ball plays a timeless melody that overlaps itself. Every creature within 30 feet of it that can hear the tune must succeed on a DC 14 Intelligence saving throw or take 7 (1d10 + 2) psychic damage. A creature that succeeds on this save is immune to this ability for the next 24 hours.

action.name: Scratch
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d4 + 1) slashing damage.

action.name: Evoke Madness (Recharge 4-6)
entries: The tulu targets one creature within 30 feet of it. The creature must succeed on a DC 13 Wisdom saving throw or become charmed by it for the duration. While the target is charmed in this way, its blood appears black, and a madness glows in its eyes. A target that succeeds on the saving throw becomes immune to the ability for 24 hours.

The charmed creature must use its action before moving on each of its turns to make a melee attack against a random creature other than itself and the tulu. The creature becomes prone and babbles incoherently if no targets can be found.
The creature can make a Wisdom saving throw at the end of each of its turns to end the effect. Otherwise, the effect lasts for one minute.

action.name: Claw
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (2d4 + 2) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 10 Constitution saving throw or become poisoned for 1 minute.

action.name: Alien Surgery
entries: If the yetling is within 5 feet of another creature that died less than a minute ago, it can spend its action stealing sections of the body. It regains 1d8 missing hit points by doing this, and can make two attacks on its next attack action.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The axolotl regains 1d4 hit points at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hit point. If the axolotl has lost any part of its body but is not killed, including a portion of its brain, it can regrow it during a long rest

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 piercing damage.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The butterfly has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Powerful Claws
entries: The coconut crab has advantage on Strength (Athletics) checks.

trait.name: Hold Breath
entries: The coconut crab has weak gills, and can survive underwater for 1 hour.

trait.name: Fall Resistance
entries: The coconut crab is immune to falling damage for up to 30 feet.

action.name: Claw
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d8 + 1) bludgeoning damage.

trait.name: Standing Leap
entries: The albertonykus' long jump is up to 20 feet and its high jump is up to 10 feet, with or without a running start.

action.name: Claw
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2 (1d4 + 1) piercing damage.

trait.name: Lightweight
entries: The aquilops is immune to falling damage for up to 30 feet.

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d8) piercing damage.

trait.name: Keen Senses
entries: The compsognathus has advantage on Perception (Wisdom) checks that rely on hearing and smell.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The compsognathus has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the compsognathus' allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 piercing damage.

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d8 + 1) piercing damage.

name: Dog
languages: understands one language but can't speak

trait.name: Keen Senses
enties: The dog has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d6) piercing damage. If the target is a tiny creature, it is also grappled (escape DC 8). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the dog can't bite another target.

action.name: Beak
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. -3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 piercing damage.

action.name: Ominous Aura (Recharge 6)
entries: The duck emits an otherworldly sense of dread for no comprehensible reason. Each creature within 15 feet of the duck must succeed on a DC 8 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened of the duck until the end of their next turn.

trait.name: Scavenging
entries: The grimalkinn can find food and fresh water for itself each day, provided that the land offers berries, small game, water, and so forth.

trait.name: Natural Language
entries: Through simple sounds, expression, and posture the grimalkinn can communicate simple ideas with small or smaller beasts.

action.name: Claw
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d4 + 1) slashing damage.

action.name: Spear
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +5 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage.

action.name: Shortbow
entries: Ranged Weapon Attack. +5 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

trait.name: Useless
entries: The koala requires 16 hours of sleep to benefit from a long rest. In addition, after attacking, the koala suffers one level of exhaustion.

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +1 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 piercing damage.

trait.name: Frantic Escape
entries: The lobster can double its swimming speed while moving backwards.

action.name: Claw
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d4 + 1) piercing damage.

trait.name: Oceanic Traveler
entries: The manta ray can always recall the general layout, flora, and fauna of locations it has visited

trait.name: Humble Guide
entries: The manta ray has 1d6 tiny fish that occupy its space alongside it.

action.name: Herd
entries: The manta ray targets one medium or smaller creature within 5 feet of itself. The creature must succeed on a DC 14 Dexterity check or be moved up to 10 feet in a direction the manta ray chooses.

trait.name: Faint
entries: As a reaction to any attack made against the opossum that does not kill it, the opossum's body instinctively fakes death. For the next minute, the opossum appears dead to all outward inspection and to spells used to determine the opossum's status. During this time, the opossum is paralyzed.

trait.name: Opossum Resilience
entries: The opossum has advantage on saving throws against poison and disease.

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 piercing damage.

trait.name: Hold Breath
entries: The otter can hold its breath for 10 minutes.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The otter has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the otter's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage.

action.name: Plead
entries: The piglet chooses one creature within 30 feet of it. The creature must make a DC 10 Wisdom saving throw. On a failure, it becomes charmed until the end of its next turn. While the creature is charmed, it cannot attack the piglet. On a success, the creature is immune to this effect for 24 hours.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The raccoon has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the raccoon's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 piercing damage.

trait.name: Relaxing Aura
entries: If there are more than 10 capybaras within 60 feet of each other, they all benefit from the sanctuary spell (DC 13).

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 piercing damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage.

action.name: Stinger
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 4 (1d8 + 1) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 9 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned for one minute. If the poisoned target is Small or Tiny, it is paralyzed; if the poisoned target is Medium or larger, its movement speed is halved. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the condition on itself on a success.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The blessling's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 12). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components:

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The chamrosh's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 12). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components:

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2 (1d6 - 1) piercing damage.

trait.name: Surprise Attack
entries: If the feluros surprises a creature and hits it with an attack during the first round of combat, the target takes an extra 5 (2d4) damage from the attack.

trait.name: Coil Bounce
entries: With a 10-foot running start, the feluros can long jump up to 25 feet. While it is in the air, it can change its trajectory as a bonus action by swinging its tail.

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d6) piercing damage.

action.name: Claws
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d6) slashing damage.

action.name: Tail Wrap
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +4 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: The target is restrained by the feluros' tail. As an action, the restrained target can make a DC 12 Strength check to free itself. The tail can also be cut by dealing 5 slashing damage (AC 14). A tail cut this way deals no damage to the feluros, and is regrown at dawn.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The loftus' innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 13). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components:

trait.name: Enigmatic Nature
entries: The loftus is immune to scrying and to any effect that would sense its emotions, read its thoughts, or detect its location.

trait.name: Keen Senses
entries: The odeye has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or sight.

trait.name: Perfect Memory
entries: The odeye can perfectly recall anything it has seen or heard in the past year.

action.name: Talons
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) slashing damage.

action.name: Runic Blast
entries: The odeye focuses arcane energy as it flaps its wings forward, causing a focused blast of concussive energy to shoot forward in a 30 foot line. Any creature caught in the blast must succeed on a DC 14 Dexterity saving throw or take 3 (1d6) thunder damage.

action.name: Slam
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (2d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Ball Up
entries: The pangol sheaths its tail inside its halo, completely protecting itself from attacks. Until it takes this action again to unravel, it benefits from full cover.

action.name: Defensive Barrier
entries: The pangol targets one medium creature or up to two small creatures within 10 feet of itself. Until the start of the pangol's next turn, the targets benefit from half cover.

trait.name: Charge
entries: If the woar moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a tuskblade attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 4 (1d8) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 13 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The woar has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the woar's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

action.name: Tuskblade
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d10 + 3) slashing damage.

action.name: Bellow
entries: The woar lets out a deep, guttural warcry that sounds like a large horn. This bellow can be heard up to 300 feet away. Any creature within 30 feet of it that can hear the cry must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or take 3 (1d6) thunder damage.

trait.name: Antimagic Susceptibility
entries: The headwear is incapacitated while in the area of an antimagic field. If targeted by dispel magic, the headwear must succeed on a Constitution saving throw against the caster's spell save DC or fall unconscious for 1 minute.

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: While the headwear remains motionless and isn't flying, it is indistinguishable from a normal hat.

trait.name: Speech Siphon
entries: While being worn by a creature that can speak at least one language, the headwear gains the ability to speak all languages known by its wearer.

action.name: Smother
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +1 to hit, reach 5 ft., one Medium or smaller creature. Hit: The creature is grappled (escape DC 11). Until this grapple ends, the target is blinded and at risk of suffocating, and the hat can't smother another target. In addition, at the start of each of the target's turns, the target takes 2 (1d4) bludgeoning damage.

trait.name: Antimagic Susceptibility
entries: The mug is incapacitated while in the area of an antimagic field. If targeted by dispel magic, the mug must succeed on a Constitution saving throw against the caster's spell save DC or fall unconscious for 1 minute.

trait.name: Fickle Bartender
entries: The mug can be coaxed into chilling, warming, or flavoring its contents with a DC 14 Persuasion check.

trait.name: Strange Language
entries: The mug can speak if it contains alphabet soup. It will likely use this form of communication to complain about not being full of its favorite beverage, often a type of ale.

action.name: Slam
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. -1 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Spill Over
entries: Ranged Weapon Attack. +3 to hit, range 5/15 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) acid, cold, or fire damage (depending on the mug's contents). After using this action, the mug falls prone and is emptied of its contents.

trait.name: Light the Way
entries: The balderdash can use a bonus action to shed bright light in a 30-foot cone, and dim light for an additional 20 feet. The balderdash can dismiss this light as a bonus action.

action.name: Slam
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d4 + 1) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Irritate (1/Day)
entries: The balderdash can use an action on its turn to target one creature within 30 feet of it. If the target can hear the balderdash, the target must succeed on a DC 12 Charisma saving throw or have disadvantage on ability checks, attack rolls, and saving throws until the start of the balderdash's next turn.

trait.name: Natural Attunement
entries: The boule is aware of the location of any gems within 10 feet of itself.

action.name: Slam
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Light Laser
entries: Ranged Weapon Attack. +4 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d12) radiant damage.

reaction.name: Crystalline Defraction (Recharge 5-6)
entries: If the boule takes damage from a spell that does not exceed its maximum hit points, it can use its reaction to reduce the damage by half. Once it does this, it can choose up to two targets within 5 feet of itself. Each target takes damage equal to the damage ignored by the boule, and of the same damage type.

action.name: Slam
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Portmanteau
entries: Ranged Spell Attack. +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2 (1d4) fire or cold damage plus 2 (1d4) lightning or acid damage.

trait.name: Perfect Memory
entries: The holo can perfectly recall anything it has seen or heard since its creation, and it perfectly remembers everything its "original" knew at the moment of its creation.

trait.name: Voice Command
entries:
When asked by name, the holo can provide one piece of information from the following list:
  • The current weather and forecast for the rest of the day.
  • The number of hours left before the next sunrise or sunset.
  • One previously mentioned piece of information that the holo was asked to remember.

action.name: Shock Surge
entries: The holo creates an electric surge to attack one target that it is touching. The target must succeed on a DC 12 Dexterity saving throw or take 1 lightning damage.

name: Basan
languages: understands Ignan and Draconic but can't speak

action.name: Talons
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d4 + 1) slashing damage.

action.name: Fire Breath (Recharge 5-6)
entries: The basan exhales fire in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 12 Dexterity saving throw, taking 4 (1d8) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Fiery Escape (Recharge 5-6)
entries: The basan magically teleports in a burst of harmless fire, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

name: Dreparous
resist: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage from nonmagical attacks

trait.name: Ethereal Sight
entries: The dreparous can see 60 feet into the Ethereal Plane when it is on the Material Plane, and vice versa.

trait.name: Incorporeal Movement
entries: The dreparous can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes 5 (1d10) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

action.name: Weakening Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +1 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (2d4 + 1) necrotic damage.

action.name: Etherealness
entries: The dreparous enters the Ethereal Plane from the Material Plane, or vice versa. It is visible on the Material Plane while it is in the Border Ethereal, and vice versa, yet it can't affect or be affected by anything on the other plane.

action.name: Necrotic Breath (Recharge 5-6)
entries: The dreparous exhales a thick, ghostly fog in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in the area must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or take 9 (2d8) necrotic damage.

name: Druk
languages: understands Auran and Draconic but can't speak

reaction.name: Lightning Rod
entries: Whenever a creature within 10 feet of a druk takes lightning damage, the druk can use its reaction to reduce the damage by half. The druk can use this ability once per short rest.

action.name: Charged Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 piercing damage plus 4 (1d8) lightning damage.

action.name: Thunder Snap (Recharge 5-6)
entries: The druk sends out a shockwave that can be heard up to 300 feet away. Any creature within 30 feet of it must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or take 3 (1d6) thunder damage. Until the start of its next turn, the druk's movement speed increases by 10.

trait.name: Spring Legs
entries: The entomodrake's jump distance is tripled.

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (2d4 + 1) piercing damage.

action.name: Acid Breath (Recharge 5-6)
entries: The entomodrake exhales a gout of acid in a 30-foot line that is 1 foot wide. Each creature in that line must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or take 9 (2d6 + 2) acid damage.

reaction.name: Tough Shell
entries: When the equtarras is hit by a ranged spell attack, it can use its reaction to reduce the damage by 1d8.

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage.

action.name: Horns
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d6) piercing damage.

action.name: Gulp
entries: The equtarras makes one bite attack against a Tiny creature. If the attack hits, the target is instead swallowed. While swallowed, the creature is blinded and restrained, benefits from full cover, and takes 3 (1d6) acid damage at the start of each of the equtarras' turns. The equtarras cannot make another bite attack unless it regurgitates the swallowed creature.
If the equtarras takes damage from the swallowed creature, or becomes grappled, it regurgitates the creature, which falls prone 5 feet in front of the equtarras.

trait.name: Hold Breath
entries: The hydra puck can hold its breath for 1 hour.

trait.name: Multiple Heads
entries: The hydra puck has two heads. While it has more than one head, the hydra puck has advantage on saving throws against being blinded and deafened.
Whenever the hydra puck takes 2 or more damage in a single turn, one of its heads dies. If all its heads die, the hydra puck dies.

At the end of its turn, it grows two heads for each of its heads that died since its last turn. The hydra puck regains 1 hit point for each head regrown in this way. The hydra puck can have up to 6 heads.
A hydra puck cannot sustain more than its original trio of heads, and sheds any excess heads it has grown during a long rest.

trait.name: Wakeful
entries: While the hydra puck sleeps, at least one of its heads is awake.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The hydra puck makes as many attacks as it has heads.

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 piercing damage.

action.name: Boiling Water Breath (Recharge 4-6)
entries: The knucker spews a line of boiling water that is 20 feet long and 1 foot wide. Each creature in that line must make a DC 12 Dexterity saving throw or take 2 (1d4) fire damage.

trait.name: Goldsense
entries: A kur can locate the largest amount of gold within a 30 foot radius of itself, provided the gold is not a part of its hoard.

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d4 + 1) piercing damage.

action.name: Fire Stream (Recharge 4-6)
entries: The kur spits a dart of fire that is 20 feet long and 1 foot wide. Each creature in that line must make a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw or take 2 (1d4) fire damage.

name: River Ribbon
languages: understands Draconic and Aquan but can't speak

trait.name: Mastery of Water
entries:
The river ribbon can shape up to 3 separate spheres of water within 30 feet of itself, each with a radius of up to 5 feet. The spheres can carry up to 15 pounds of additional material, including the river ribbon. It can use an action to manipulate the spheres in any of the following ways:
  • Cause one or more spheres to fly with a speed of 30 feet
  • Cause one sphere to form simple shapes and animate
  • Freeze one sphere or cause it to boil, provided there are no creatures in it
  • Make a slam attack with one sphere

action.name: Horn
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 piercing damage.

action.name: Water Sphere Slam
entries: Ranged Weapon Attack. +6 to hit, range 15/30 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

trait.name: Aura of Progress
entries: All beasts benefit from a +3 bonus to their Intelligence score when they are within 20 feet of the vishap.

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2 (1d4) piercing damage.

action.name: Force Breath (Recharge 5-6)
entries: The vishap expels a massive force that fills a 15-foot cone. Each creature in the area must succeed on a DC 12 Dexterity saving throw or take 4 (1d8) force damage.

trait.name: Slow Growth
entries: The wormlet is naturally a Tiny creature that reaches up to 2 and a half feet. However, if given double daily rations, it can grow an additional foot every 1d6 days. The wormlet stops growing after it reaches 6 feet long, and becomes a Small creature.

trait.name: Tunneler
entries: The wormlet can burrow through solid rock at half its burrow speed and leaves behind a 4-inch-diameter tunnel in its wake. If the wormlet is a Small creature, this tunnel instead has a diameter of 1 foot.

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: While the armordillo remains balled up and motionless, it is indistinguishable from a shiny stone.

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 piercing damage.

action.name: Ball Up
entries: The armordillo rolls itself into a ball, completely protecting itself from attacks. Until it takes this action again to unravel, it benefits from full cover.

trait.name: Rejuvenation
entries: The bennu's body turns to ash when it drops to 0 hit points, and its equipment is left behind. The bennu gains a new body after 1 day, regaining all its hit points and becoming active again. The new body forms 5 feet above the ashes, granted the area is unoccupied and not submerged in water.

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

action.name: Fire Breath (Recharge 5-6)
entries: The bennu exhales fire in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw, taking 7 (2d6) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

trait.name: Body of Fire
entries: The burnling can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide. In addition, any creature that touches the burnling or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 1 fire damage.

trait.name: Illumination
entries: The burnling sheds bright light in a 10-foot radius and dim light for an additional 10 feet.

trait.name: Water Weakness
entries: The burnling will instantly die if submerged in more than 1 gallon of water.

action.name: Burn
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) fire damage. If the target is a flammable object, it ignites. The object on fire takes 2 (1d4) damage at the start of the burnling's turn, until someone takes an action to douse the fire, or until the burnling moves more than 10 feet from the object.

name: Pearl Python
resist: piercing and slashing damage from nonmagical attacks

trait.name: Elemental Egress
entries: If the pearl python takes damage that would reduce it below 0 hit points, but not kill it outright, it instead transforms into a pearl that weighs 1 pound. It then begins to reform by crystallization, regaining its form after 1d6 + 1 days.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The pearl python has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Metamorphic Digestion
entries: The pearl python can produce one gemstone (determined by the GM) every 1d10 days, provided it has been fed daily.

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

action.name: Constrict
entries: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: The target takes 5 (1d4 + 3) bludgeoning damage and is grappled. The pearl python cannot grapple more than one target at a time.

action.name: Restock
entries: The shingle exerts energy to regain stones it has lost. It collects 1d4 stones within 10 feet of it, and regains a number of hit points equal to the stones collected.

action.name: Slam
entries: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Stone Fling
entries: Ranged Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, range 15/30 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) bludgeoning damage.

name: Windole
resist: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage from nonmagical attacks

trait.name: Reconstitute
entries: If the windole is in its native environment, it regains 2d6 hit points at the start of its next turn after taking damage.

action.name: Slice
entries: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 slashing damage.

action.name: Fling
entries: Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range 15/30 ft., one target. Hit: 2 (1d4) bludgeoning damage.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The bai ze's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom. It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material or verbal components:

trait.name: Charge
entries: If the bai ze moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a ram attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 2 (1d4) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a 11 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

action.name: Ram
entries: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) bludgeoning damage.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The flitterbell's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom. It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

action.name: Irritate (1/Day)
entries: The flitterbell can use an action on its turn to target one creature within 30 feet of it. If the target can hear the flitterbell, the target must succeed on a 12 Charisma saving throw or have disadvantage on ability checks, attack rolls, and saving throws until the start of the flitterbell's next turn.

name: Kitsune
languages: understands Common and Sylvan but can't speak

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The kitsune's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save 13). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material or verbal components:

trait.name: Shapechanger
entries: The kitsune can use its action to polymorph into a humanoid form that resembles a young woman, or back into its true form. Other than its size, its statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The kitsune has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 (1d4 - 3) piercing damage.

action.name: Spirit Orbs
entries: Ranged Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, range 10/25 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d8) fire damage.

trait.name: Keen Hearing
entries: The moon singer has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing.

trait.name: Water Walking
entries: The moon singer can stand on and move across any liquid surface as if it were solid ground.

action.name: Song of Sorrow (1/Day)
entries: The moon singer lets out a brief melody of cries, indicating great sorrow. Any creature within 30 feet of it that can hear it must succeed on a 12 Wisdom saving throw or become paralyzed until the start of the moon singer's next turn.

trait.name: Shapechanger
entries: The puca can use its action to polymorph into a small or medium creature of its own design. Its statistics, other than its size, are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It turns into a pile of confetti-like material if it dies.

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2 (1d4) piercing damage.

action.name: Scratch
entries: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 slashing damage.

action.name: Throw Debris
entries: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 10/20 ft., one target. Hit: 1 bludgeoning damage.

trait.name: Shapechanger
entries: The tanuki can use its action to polymorph into a small or medium humanoid, or back into its true form. Its statistics, other than its size, are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

action.name: Slam
entries: Melee Weapon Attack: +1 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2 (1d6 - 1) bludgeoning damage.

trait.name: Armor Class.
entries: The Tiki Spirit has the same AC as its ally.

trait.name: Guardian's Protection
entries: If an ally within 5 feet of the tiki spirit takes less than 15 damage, and that damage would reduce it to 0 hit points, the tiki spirit can use its reaction to negate the damage and disappear. After 8 hours, the tiki spirit reappears within 5 feet of the creature targeted by this ability.

trait.name: Keen Senses
entries: The wolpertinger has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or sight.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The wolpertinger has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack: +0 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 piercing damage, and the target must make a 10 Constitution saving throw or take 2 (1d4) poison damage.

name: Blood Acher
senses: tremorsense 30 ft. (blind beyond this radius, see bloodsight)
languages: understands Infernal but can't speak it

trait.name: Bloodsight
entries: If a creature that can bleed is damaged within 600 feet of a blood acher, the blood acher learns that creature's location. Until the creature is healed, the blood acher knows the fastest route to the creature, and has advantage on all survival checks made to find them.

trait.name: Life Drain
entries: Whenever a blood acher deals damage to another creature, the blood acher can use a bonus action to heal a number of hit points equal to its Constitution modifier.

action.name: Body Slam
entries: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage. If the target is a medium or smaller creature, it becomes grappled (escape 14).

action.name: Quill
entries: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 30/60 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d4 + 1) piercing damage.

action.name: Siphon
entries: The blood acher targets one creature it has grappled. The target must make a 14 Constitution saving throw, taking 7 (2d6) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one.

name: Cerbus
languages: understands Infernal but can't speak it

action.name: Infernal Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., up to two targets within 5 feet of each other. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage plus 3 (1d6) fire damage.

action.name: Tail
entries: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d4 + 1) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) poison damage.

trait.name: Pacify, Never Kill
entries: The chorden is unable to deal lethal damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The chorden makes two attacks: one with its meathook and one with its chain wrap.

action.name: Meathook
entries: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

action.name: Chain Wrap
entries: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) bludgeoning damage and the target becomes grappled (escape 12).

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting (Psionics)
headerEntries: The moon doppler's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save 13). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components:

trait.name: Dream Invader
entries: The moon doppler can cast dream once per day, but is unable to use this spell to deal damage. This ability resets on a long rest.

trait.name: Shapechanger
entries: The moon doppler can use its action to polymorph into a Small or Tiny creature it has seen within the past week. Its statistics, other than its size, are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies or uses this ability again.

action.name: Scratch
entries: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) slashing damage.

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: The target takes 5 (2d4) piercing damage, and must succeed on a 11 Constitution saving throw or become poisoned for 1d4 rounds.

action.name: Sticky Bolas (Recharge 5-6)
entries: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 20/40 ft., one target. Hit: The target is restrained by webbing and falls prone. As an action, the restrained target can make a 12 Strength check, bursting the webbing on a success. The webbing can also be attacked and destroyed (AC 10; hp 1; immunity to bludgeoning, poison, and psychic damage).

action.name: Cry of Guilt (Recharge 5-6)
entries: The strix lets out a long cry, proclaiming trouble to all who hear it. Every creature within 30 feet of it that can hear the strix must make a 13 Wisdom saving throw. On a failure, they take 5 (2d4) psychic damage and become frightened until the end of their next turn.

action.name: Talons
entries: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) slashing damage.

action.name: Swipe
entries: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) slashing damage. As a bonus action after this attack hits, the teeniloth can attempt a Sleight of Hand check against the target's passive Perception to take one tiny object that the target is carrying.

action.name: Coin Fling (Recharge 3-6)
entries: Ranged Weapon Attack: + +5 to hit, range 15/30 ft., one target. Hit: 2 (1d4) bludgeoning damage, and a copper, silver, or electrum piece lands in the target's space.

action.name: Teleport
entries: The teeniloth, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, teleports up to 15 feet to an unoccupied space that it can see.

trait.name: Air of Insult
entries: The thisschord can cast Vicious Mockery at will.

action.name: Dominant Seventh
entries: The thisschord targets one creature within 60 feet of itself that can hear, and plays a powerful tune. The creature must succeed on a 14 Wisdom saving throw or take 5 (1d4 + 3) psychic damage.

action.name: Diminished Discord (Recharge 5-6)
entries: The thisschord targets two creatures within 30 feet of itself that can hear, and plays a discordant tune. The target creatures must succeed on a 14 Wisdom saving throw or become hostile to each other until the end of their next turn.

action.name: Claw
entries: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 (1d6 - 2) slashing damage.

action.name: Siphon
entries: The wizard's parasite targets one creature that it can touch. The target must make a 11 Wisdom saving throw or take 1 psychic damage, and is unaware of the damage dealt unless it reduces them below half of their maximum hit points. On a success, the target becomes aware of the wizard's parasite, but does not know its location.

name: Bio #113
languages: understands Common but can't speak it

trait.name: Adaptive Body
entries: If the Bio #625 spends at least one hour touching a creature of certain types, its body physically changes, giving it a unique ability. It can only have one adaptation at a time.
Aberration It becomes purple and rubbery, and can cast levitate on itself at will.
Celestial It turns silver and gains a halo. This halo sheds bright light in a 10-foot radius and dim light for an additional 10 feet.
Construct It gains clockwork features and does not require air, food, drink, or sleep.
Dragon It grows superficial wings and scales. Its ranged attack deals fire damage instead of acid
Elemental Its body is covered in the related element, and it gains resistance to the appropriate damage type.
Ooze It becomes translucent, and it can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.
Plant Its fur is replaced with leaves. While it remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an ordinary shrub.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Bio #133 makes up to two attacks: one bite attack and one spew attack.

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d4 + 1) piercing damage, and the target must make a 11 Constitution saving throw, taking 7 (2d6) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Spew
entries: Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range 15/30 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (2d8) acid damage.

name: Crabbit
languages: understands Common but can't speak it

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The crabbit has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the crabbit's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

trait.name: Keen Senses
entries: The crabbit has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or sight.

action.name: Call for Help
entries: The crabbit lets out an alarm cry, signaling all allied creatures within 120 feet of it to join its fight.

action.name: Beak
entries: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 piercing damage.

name: Flying Emperor Monkey
languages: understands Common but can't speak it

action.name: Fist
entries: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Throw Feces (Recharge 3-6)
entries: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 15/30 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d6) poison damage.

trait.name: Shapechanger
entries: The mimcat can use its action to polymorph into an object that fits within a 2 foot cube, a tiny creature, or back into its true, amorphous form. Its statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

trait.name: False Appearance (Object Form Only)
entries: While the mimcat remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an ordinary object.

action.name: Pseudopod
entries: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d4 + 1) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 piercing damage plus 2 (1d4) acid damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The pygmy owlbear makes two attacks: one with its beak and one with its claws.

action.name: Beak
entries: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

action.name: Claws
entries: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) slashing damage.

trait.name: Pounce
entries: If the savannah tatzelwurm moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a bite attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a 12 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

trait.name: Running Leap
entries: With a 10-foot running start, the savannah tatzelwurm can long jump up to 25 feet.

action.name: Poison Breath (Recharge 5-6)
entries: The savannah tatzelwurm exhales poison in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a 14 Dexterity saving throw, taking 7 (2d6) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage plus 2 (1d4) poison damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) slashing damage.

trait.name: Magnetic Detection
entries: The tarnisher can sense the location of ferrous metals within 30 feet of it by testing their reactions to a magnetic field. Iron, nickel, and cobalt within 5 feet of the tarnisher are immediately drawn to it, and require a 8 Strength (Athletics) check to pry off again.

trait.name: Tarnish Metal
entries: Any nonmagical metal that the tarnisher clings to begins to corrode. For each minute the tarnisher is in contact with a nonmagical weapon, the weapon takes a permanent and cumulative -1 penalty to damage rolls. If its penalty drops to -5, the weapon is destroyed. For each minute the tarnisher is in contact with any metal, nonmagical armor, it takes a permanent and cumulative -1 penalty to the AC it offers. Armor reduced to an AC of 10 or a shield that drops to a +0 bonus is destroyed.

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack: +1 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 piercing damage.

action.name: Ancient Staff
entries: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2 (1d6 - 1) bludgeoning damage, or 3 (1d8 - 1) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The tradex's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma. It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material or verbal components:

action.name: Ancient Staff
entries: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2 (1d6 - 1) bludgeoning damage, or 3 (1d8 - 1) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands.

trait.name: Amorphous
entries: The pudding cup can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

trait.name: Corrosive Form
entries: A creature that touches the pudding cup or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 1 acid damage.The pudding cup can eat through 1-inch-thick, nonmagical material that isn't glass or stone over the course of 1 minute.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The pudding cup can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

action.name: Pseudopod
entries: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d4 + 1) bludgeoning damage plus 2 (1d4) acid damage.

trait.name: Corrosive
entries: At the start of its turn, one target creature or nonmetal object that is touching the gellump takes 2 (1d4) acid damage.

trait.name: Transparent
entries: Even when the gellump is in plain sight, it takes a successful 12 Wisdom (Perception) check to spot a gellump that has neither moved nor attacked. A creature that tries to enter the gellump's space while unaware of the gellump is surprised by the gellump.

action.name: Pseudopod
entries: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 acid damage.

action.name: Latch On
entries: The gellump moves up to its speed. If it enters another creature's space, the creature must succeed on a 11 Dexterity saving throw or have the gellump latch on to them. While the gellump is latched on to a target, it becomes grappled by the creature. The creature can try to remove the gellump by taking an action to make a 11 Strength check, dropping it within 5 feet of them on a success.

action.name: Merge
entries: The gummybear ooze chooses one other gummybear ooze within 5 feet of itself. They then merge together, combining their hit points and growing by one size category. If this action is taken four times without splitting, the group becomes an amalgamation.

action.name: Fist
entries: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) bludgeoning damage plus 3 (1d6) acid damage.

reaction.name: Split
entries: When a gummybear ooze is subjected to lightning or slashing damage, it splits into two segments if it has at least 4 hit points. Each new segment has hit points equal to half the original gummybear ooze's, rounded down. New segments are one size smaller than the original gummybear ooze.

action.name: Slam
entries: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (3d4 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Lob Gummybear (Recharge 5-6)
entries: Ranged Weapon Attack: -1 to hit, range 10/20 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d8) acid damage, and a gummybear segment appears within 5 feet of the target.

reaction.name: Split
entries: When a gummybear ooze amalgamation is subjected to lightning or slashing damage, it splits into two segments if it has at least 20 hit points. Each new segment has hit points equal to half the original amalgamation's, rounded down. New segments are medium-sized. If the amalgamation is reduced to less than 20 hit points, it instead becomes a gummybear ooze.

action.name: Repair
entries: The segment can use its action to grab another segment within 5 feet of itself and become a gummybear ooze again. This action does not restore its hit points.

action.name: Pseudopod
entries: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2 (1d4) bludgeoning damage plus 2 (1d4) acid damage.

trait.name: Sun Charge
entries: For each hour the bloom crawler spends under direct sunlight, it regains 1d4 hit points.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The bloom crawler makes two tendril attacks or one seed spit attack.

action.name: Tendrils
entries: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Seed Spit
entries: Ranged Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, range 20/40 ft., up to three targets. Hit: 2 (1d4 + 1) piercing damage.

name: Bonsai Treant
languages: understands Common and Druidic but can't speak them

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: While the bonsai treant remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a small potted tree.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The bonsai treant makes two slam attacks.

action.name: Slam
entries: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Animate Shrub (1/Day)
entries: The bonsai treant magically animates one shrub it can see within 30 feet of it. These shrubs have the same statistics as an awakened shrub, except they have Intelligence and Charisma scores of 1, and they can't speak. An animated shrub acts as an ally of the bonsai treant. The shrub remains animated for 1 hour or until it dies, until the bonsai treant dies or is more than 120 feet from the shrub, or until the bonsai treant takes a bonus action to turn it back into an inanimate shrub. The shrub then takes root if possible.

action.name: Spiney Fist
entries: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) bludgeoning damage plus 1 piercing damage.

action.name: Spear
entries: Ranged Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage.

trait.name: Produce Pear
entries: At the start of each day, roll 1d6. On a 5-6, the cactal folk produces one prickly pear. The cactal folk can have no more than 3 fully grown pears at a time. A creature can take an action to eat the pear, gaining 1d4 temporary hit points for the next hour.

action.name: Spiney Fist
entries: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d4 + 1) bludgeoning damage plus 2 (1d4) piercing damage.

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: While the turf remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a small clump of weeds.

trait.name: Foster Growth
entries: The turf can cast Druidcraft at will, without requiring verbal or somatic components.

action.name: Rake
entries: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 slashing damage.

trait.name: Taunting Berries
entries: The vine-snake has 1d6 berries that regrow during a long rest. A creature that eats one of the berries must succeed on a 11 Constitution saving throw or become poisoned for 1 minute.

trait.name: Multiple Heads
entries: The vine-snake has three or more functioning heads. While it has at least more than one head, the vine snake has advantage on saving throws against being blinded, deafened, and stunned.Whenever the vine snake takes damage and has more than one head, a head dies. The vine snake can regrow a head over the course of a long rest, regaining 1d6 hit points.

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: While the vine snake remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal plant.

trait.name: Wakeful
entries: While the vine snake sleeps, at least one of its heads is awake.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The vine snake makes up to three bite attacks, provided it has enough heads to do so.

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 piercing damage plus 1 poison damage.

trait.name: Conscientious Objector
entries: The fungal folk will not take attack actions.

trait.name: Nifty Crafting
entries: As part of a short rest, the fungal folk can gather small objects and materials to create one of the following: a backpack, a bedroll, a bucket, a climbers kit, a grappling hook, 15 feet of rope, or a quarterstaff. The item weighs 1 pound and breaks after 1d6 hours.

action.name: Create Siblings
entries: The fungal folk spews spores around itself in a 15-foot radius. Over the course of an hour, up to 2d10 new fungal folk will sprout from the area, provided there are unoccupied spaces for them.

trait.name: Teeming Teeth
entries: The dentacle is aware of any other dentacles within a 300-foot radius. All dentacles are considered friendly to one another, unless they are charmed or under a similar effect.

trait.name: Undead Fortitude
entries: If damage reduces the dentacle to 0 hit points, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5 + the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a success, the dentacle drops to 1 hit point instead.

action.name: Chomp
entries: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Toothpick
entries: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 10/20 ft., one target. Hit: 2 (1d4) piercing damage.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The exhoul's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom. It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material or verbal components:

trait.name: Undead Fortitude
entries: If damage reduces the exhoul to 0 hit points, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5 + the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a success, the exhoul drops to 1 hit point instead.

action.name: Slam
entries: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d8 + 1) bludgeoning damage.

trait.name: Turn Immunity
entries: The hand axe is immune to effects that turn undead.

trait.name: Skittering Retreat
entries: If the hand axe makes a successful melee attack against a creature (whether in axe form or hand form), that creature can't make opportunity attacks against it for the rest of the hand axe's turn.

trait.name: Form Change
entries: The hand axe can use a bonus action to change to an immobile axe form, or back into its true form, which resembles a modified crawling claw. While in its axe form, it has a speed of 0 and can be wielded as a +1 handaxe.

action.name: Slash
entries: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) slashing damage.

action.name: Scratch (True Form Only)
entries: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d4 + 1) slashing damage.

trait.name: Incorporeal Movement
entries: The renine can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes 3 (1d6) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

trait.name: Ethereal Sight
entries: The renine can see 60 feet into the Ethereal Plane when it is on the Material Plane, and vice versa.

action.name: Ghostly Whimper (Recharge 5-6)
entries: The renine lets out a heart-shattering whimper. All other creatures within 15 feet of it must succeed on a 12 Wisdom save or take 3 (1d6) psychic damage.

action.name: Etherealness
entries: The renine enters the Ethereal Plane from the Material Plane, or vice versa. It is visible on the Material Plane while it is in the Border Ethereal, and vice versa, yet it can't affect or be affected by anything on the other plane.

action.name: Spectral Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d4 + 1) necrotic damage.

trait.name: Natural Stealth
entries: While in dim light or darkness, the silhouette can take the Hide action as a bonus action.

trait.name: Sunlight Weakness
entries: While in sunlight, the silhouette has disadvantage on attack rolls, ability checks, and saving throws.

action.name: Shadow Drain
entries: While standing in the shadow of a creature, the silhouette can use its action to try and drain the creature's energy. The target creature must succeed on a 12 Constitution saving throw or take 3 (1d6) necrotic damage. A creature killed by this ability has a 20% chance of becoming a silhouette.

name: Revelatory Tarrasque
immune: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage from nonmagical attacks

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The tarrasque's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma. It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (5/Day)
entries: If the tarrasque fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The tarrasque has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Reflective Carapace
entries: Any time the tarrasque is targeted by a magic missile spell, a line spell, or a spell that requires a ranged attack roll, roll a . On a 1 to 5, the tarrasque is unaffected. On a 6, the tarrasque is unaffected, and the effect is reflected back at the caster as though it originated from the tarrasque, turning the caster into the target.

trait.name: Siege Monster
entries: The tarrasque deals double damage to objects and structures.

trait.name: Prescient
entries: The tarrasque cannot be surprised and always goes first in initiative order.

trait.name: Augmented Critical
entries: The tarrasque's attacks score a critical hit on a die roll of 18-20, and on a critical hit it rolls damage dice three times, instead of twice.

trait.name: Earthbind Aura
entries: Creatures with a fly speed within 1 mile of the tarrasque have their fly speed reduced to 0. If a creature is in midair when it becomes affected by Earthbind Aura, it falls at a rate of 60 feet per round until it reaches the ground.

trait.name: Elder of Annihilation
entries: The tarrasque ignores all other creatures' damage resistances and immunities.

trait.name: Limited Magic Immunity
entries: The tarrasque can't be affected or detected by spells of 6th level or lower unless it wishes to be. It has advantage on saving throws against all other spells and magical effects.

trait.name: Reactive
entries: The tarrasque can take one reaction per turn, instead of one per round.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The tarrasque regains 60 hit points at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hit point remaining.

trait.name: Sure-Footed
entries: The tarrasque has advantage on saving throws made against effects that would knock it prone.

trait.name: Trample
entries: When the tarrasque enters any enemy's space for the first time on a turn, the enemy must succeed on a DC 19 Dexterity saving throw or take 31 (6d6 + 10) bludgeoning damage and be knocked prone.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The tarrasque can use its Frightful Presence. It then makes five attacks: one with its bite, two with its claws, one with its horns, and one with its tail. It can use its Swallow instead of its bite. Alternatively, it makes three rock attacks.

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +24 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. Hit: 49 (6d12 + 10) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it is grappled (escape DC 32). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the tarrasque can't bite another target.

action.name: Claw
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +24 to hit, reach 25 ft., one target. Hit: 38 (6d8 + 10) slashing damage.

action.name: Horns
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +24 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. Hit: 43 (6d10 + 10) piercing damage.

action.name: Tail
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +24 to hit, reach 30 ft., one target. Hit: 31 (6d6 + 10) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 32 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

action.name: Rock
entries: Ranged Weapon Attack. +24 to hit, ramge 360/1440 ft., one target. Hit: 49 (6d12 + 10) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Frightful Presence
entries: Each creature of the tarrasque's choice within 240 feet of it and aware of it must succeed on a DC 30 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, with disadvantage if the tarrasque is within line of sight, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the tarrasque's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

action.name: Swallow
entries: The tarrasque makes one bite attack against a Large or smaller creature it is grappling. If the attack hits, the target takes the bite's damage, the target is swallowed, and the grapple ends. While swallowed, the creature is blinded and restrained, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the tarrasque, and it takes 84 (24d6) acid damage at the start of each of the tarrasque's turns.

If the tarrasque takes 60 damage or more on a single turn from a creature inside it, the tarrasque must succeed on a DC 20 Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures, which fall prone in a space within 10 feet of the tarrasque. If the tarrasque dies, a swallowed creature is no longer restrained by it and can escape from the corpse by using 30 feet of movement, exiting prone.

action.name: Annihilation Breath (Recharge 5-6)
entries: The tarrasque exhales pure energy in a 240-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 32 Constitution saving throw, taking 119 (34d6) force damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. If this damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, it is disintegrated. A disintegrated creature is reduced to a pile of fine gray dust. The creature can be restored to life only by means of a true resurrection or a wish spell. The tarrasque's annihilation breath automatically disintegrates nonmagical objects or creations of magical force.

reaction.name: Frenzied Attack
entries: When the tarrasque is dealt damage that reduces it to half its hit point maximum or lower, it makes one claw attack against a creature within its reach.

legendary.name: Attack
entries: The tarrasque makes one claw attack or tail attack.

legendary.name: Move
entries: The tarrasque moves up to half its speed.

legendary.name: Chomp (Costs 2 Actions)

entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 33 (5d10 + 5) piercing damage.

action.name: Tail

trait.name: Unpredictable
entries: The buffalo has advantage on saving throws against any effect that would control what action it would take, such as the charmed condition.

action.name: Ram
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (2d8 + 5) piercing damage.

entries: If the ox moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 7 (2d6) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 14 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

trait.name: Beast of Burden
entries: The ox is considered to be a Huge animal for the purpose of determining its carrying capacity.

action.name: Gore
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage.

trait.name: Bad Flier
entries: The chicken falls at the end of a turn if it's airborne and the only thing holding it aloft is its flying speed.

action.name: Peck

action.name: Claws

action.name: Peck

trait.name: Magic Resistance

action.name: Multiattack
